episodes.title: S6E19 - Church of God (Restoration)
episodes.description:
We have a HUGE episode for you this week! The Church of God is located in Greenville, Ohio with many locations throughout the US. Kaitlyn just so happens to know someone who was involved in this cult. Yes it is a cult, despite the name. So today, we bring you an episode with a guest interview! We hope you enjoy the insight our guest provides us into this "church". 
.
.
.

episodes.title: S6E18 - Colonia Dignidad
episodes.description:
Tuesday! Tuesday! This week Erica is back to tell you about a man named Paul, who fled to Chile. Of course, Paul was not a good man, and I am here to tell you about all the bad things he did. Grab your snacks, have a listen, enjoy your week, and stay safe!
.
.
.

episodes.title: S6E17 - The Church of the Lamb of God
episodes.description:
This week, Kaitlyn brings you a tale of a cult with too many words in the name. Imagine that! This one is dark, y'all. Buckle up, and prepare to learn about the old Mormon principle "blood atonement." Don't say we didn't warn you!
.
.
.

episodes.title: S6E16 - Warren Jeffs
episodes.description:
Happy Tuesday! I hope everyone had a safe and wonderful 4th of July weekend. Welcome back, this week Erica tells you about a man with multiple wives....who of course didn't do great things. Strap in, and have a listen to the episode. Make sure to come back next week to listen to Kaitlyn!
.
.
.

episodes.title: S6E15 - Manson Family
episodes.description:
Welcome back! Thank you for understanding our need for a little break. As a thank you Kaitlyn brings you another infamous cult. But buckle up; this one's a doozy. Pretty much everyone knows about Charles Manson and his hippie cult, but do you know the full extent of the Manson Family's crimes? It's intense. Enjoy, and we are sorry in advance. 
.
.
.

episodes.title: S6E3 - Synanon
episodes.description: This week Kaitlyn discusses a drug rehabilitation program turned "alternate society" (a.k.a. cult), Synanon. From a humble beginning to a violent and litigious end, this episode is pretty heavy. So buckle up and get ready to say Kaitlyn's favorite phrase aimed at the leader, Chuck Dederich. . . .
